text: Yalli isi farmoytay Yallih aayootay baxxaqqaley cakkii kee deedal ittak baxissa siinil yakriye siinih ruube, Yallaa kee kay farmoytal yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasita mara diteetak diif√ª fanah yayyaaqenkeh, Yallal yeemeneeh meqe taama abbaasite mara jannootay guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa ken culsa, usun umman tet addal waarak, nummah Yalli jannatal rizqhi keenih yeymeeqeeh farakka keenih elle hee
